channel.title: Halo Custom Edition: A server for MSCP!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110414004533/halo/es/images/4/44/Halo_Custom_Edition.jpg[/img] [b]What is Halo Custom Edition?[/b] Halo custom edition is the add on for Halo Combat Evolved for the PC made by GearBox, basically, users can make their own maps with limits only being the game engine, which can come up to some really whacky things... [youtube][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SMBE4QNiuqE]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SMBE4QNiuqE[/url][/youtube] [youtube][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKQPiy-8P3Q]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKQPiy-8P3Q[/url][/youtube] [youtube][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8eZIwb_PpF8]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8eZIwb_PpF8[/url][/youtube] This map is literally a few miles long. [youtube][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uqbqBXbFVo8]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uqbqBXbFVo8[/url][/youtube] This is just an crumb compared to whats possible, and all the maps out there right now![b] MoparScape Server[/b] [img]http://cache.www.gametracker.com/server_info/208.67.252.147:2565/b_560x95.png[/img] [b]SERVER IS CURRENTLY ONLINE BUT IM TESTING STUFF OUT:[/b] [b][size=11px]208.67.252.147:2565[/size][/b] [url=http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=2040]http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=2040[/url] [size=1em]Download that map[/size] [size=1em]Go to the path where you installed your game, enter maps and drag the .map file in there. [/size] [b]FAQ[/b] "Go to hell I'm not paying for anything" You don't, I can get you the game for free.
"No seriously, how much does it cost" You don't have to pay..
"Fun?" Yep
"How do i know u wont just add stupid maps" I'll make sure people vote on it! [b]How to get Halo Custom Edition For Free![/b] [font=verdana][size=13px][url=http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=410]http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=410[/url] [/size][/font][font=verdana][size=13px]Download that [/size][/font][url=http://pastebin.com/Sih2MNgf]http://pastebin.com/Sih2MNgf[/url] use any of those for the cd key
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?2mfqw9p0y1711fc]http://www.mediafire.com/?2mfqw9p0y1711fc[/url] (The crack) This SHOULD be a safe file since I myself have had it for a long time, plus I got a few other people to install it too who had no problems. Anyways.. Once you do that, navigate to Program Files or Program Files (x86) > microsoft games > Halo Custom Edition drag the crack into there, run the program that says haloupdate with the legendary icon, once thats done reinsert the crack again and your done
[b]Single Player[/b] Here is the Halo 1 campaign files, I haven't tried any of them, credits to fcdxsza123 for compiling it together, read the text file inside for instructions.
Part 1: [url=https://hotfile.com/dl/221511756/b8fa880/mappack.zip.html]https://hotfile.com/dl/221511756/b8fa880/mappack.zip.html[/url]
Part 2: [url=https://hotfile.com/dl/221513333/7dd5c1b/mappack2.zip.html]https://hotfile.com/dl/221513333/7dd5c1b/mappack2.zip.html[/url]
[b]Mumble[/b] [img]http://invalidmagic.files.wordpress.com/2009/10/mumble.png[/img] We have a 32 slot mumble server! [b]208.67.252.147:64828[/b] Please try to be in it when you play to communicate better.[/center]
[center][b]Maps being looked at[/b] Foundry from Halo 3 http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=6677 I personally haven't tried this map, but it looks really nice and I'll probably try it some time soon. CMT Snow Grove http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=2731 I've played on this map ALOT, and I can say its pretty fun and well made, this will probably be added in. Tallon IV Overworld http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=3357 Metroid!!! Yes, I used to play this map all the time and it was pretty damn fun actually... [/center]

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:45, topic:518914”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=637183.msg4306740#msg4306740 date=1369969322]

We need to set up a community play date.

I think it should be after June 4th, when I finish school
[/quote]
Make it official xD[/quote]
We need new maps first:|

I tried the Halo 3 Foundry map, and I don’t know why it was rated 1.9 at the time I downloaded it, it was actually pretty good

Flame_:

Point it out for me if I missed it, but is there a Mac-supporting client? Or is the available client cross-compatible.

I’ve seen some people do it, but I don’t think theres any public releases

Well afaik at least
Guys, the problem is everyone goes on the server at different times, so its as if hardly anyone goes on :S
If it keeps up I’ll have to refund because it would be a waist tbh
